\documentclass[crop,tikz]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{quiver}

\begin{document}
\begin{tikzpicture}[baseline= (a).base]
  \node[scale=1.5] (a) at (0,0){
  % https://q.uiver.app/#
  \begin{tikzcd}
	&&&& 4 \\
	\\
	&& 3 && 2 && 1 && 0 \\
	& 2 & 1 & 0 & 1 & 0 & 0 \\
	1 & 0 & 0 && 0 \\
	0
	\arrow[no head, from=1-5, to=3-3]
	\arrow[no head, from=1-5, to=3-5]
	\arrow[no head, from=1-5, to=3-7]
	\arrow[no head, from=1-5, to=3-9]
	\arrow[no head, from=3-3, to=4-2]
	\arrow[no head, from=3-3, to=4-3]
	\arrow[no head, from=3-3, to=4-4]
	\arrow[no head, from=3-5, to=4-5]
	\arrow[no head, from=3-5, to=4-6]
	\arrow[no head, from=3-7, to=4-7]
	\arrow[no head, from=4-2, to=5-1]
	\arrow[no head, from=4-2, to=5-2]
	\arrow[no head, from=4-3, to=5-3]
	\arrow[no head, from=4-5, to=5-5]
	\arrow[no head, from=5-1, to=6-1]
\end{tikzcd}
  };
\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
